Description: This design is sure to wow. The dress has a mock two piece design that appears to have an open waist line with a jeweled belt. The sleeves and neckline are jeweled to complete the accented look of the bodice. The matching jeweled belt and waistline with the high split front add to the sexy chic look of this dress.
